summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Engineer to incur an indebtedness against the General Fund of The City of Seattle, in the sum of One Hundred Seventy and 32/100 Dollars ($170.32), for the purpose of completing the improvement of North Broadway and E. Newton St., by paving the same, as authorized by Ordinance No. 21733, creating Local Improvement District No. 2174.
